document.full_text: the strikes came after a 72-hour bombing lull to allow president jacob zuma of south africa to fly into tripoli on an unsuccessful peace mission for the african union.
document.title: nato resumes airstrikes after qaddafi vows to fight on
lines_and_colors: the strikes came after a 72-hour bombing lull to allow president jacob zuma of south africa to fly into tripoli on an unsuccessful peace mission for the african union.
